vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.10.22;
son of: Shem (H8035);
brother of: Asshur (H0804H), Elam (H5867C), Arpachshad (H0775) and Lud (H3865);
father of: Uz (H5780), Hul (H2343), Gether (H1666) and Mash (H4851)
§ Aram or Arameans = "exalted"
n pr m
1) Aram or Syriathe nation
2) the Syrian or Aramean people
Aram = "exalted"
n m
3) fifth son of Shem
4) a grandson of Nahor
5) a descendant of Asher
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
陽性專有名詞
亞蘭 或 亞蘭人 这个字在原文的意思是 "被高舉"
1) 亞蘭國或敘利亞國
2) 亞蘭人或敘利亞人
陽性名詞
亞蘭 = "被高舉"
3) 閃的第五個兒子 (代上 1:17)
4) 拿鶴的孫子 (創 22:21)
5) 亞設的後裔 (代上 7:34)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
阳性专有名词
亚兰 或 亚兰人 这个字在原文的意思是 "被高举"
1) 亚兰国或叙利亚国
2) 亚兰人或叙利亚人
阳性名词
亚兰 = "被高举"
3) 闪的第五个儿子 (代上 1:17)
4) 拿鹤的孙子 (创 22:21)
5) 亚设的后裔 (代上 7:34)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, only mentioned at Gen.22.21;
son of: Kemuel (H7055)
§ Aram or Arameans = "exalted"
n pr m
1) Aram or Syriathe nation
2) the Syrian or Aramean people
Aram = "exalted"
n m
3) fifth son of Shem
4) a grandson of Nahor
5) a descendant of Asher

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
§ Aram or Arameans = "exalted"
n pr m
This name is used for:
1) Aram or Syriathe nation
2) the Syrian or Aramean people
Aram = "exalted"
n m
3) fifth son of Shem
4) a grandson of Nahor
5) a descendant of Asher

A man of the tribe of Asher living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.7.34;
son of: Shomer (H7763H);
brother of: Ahi (H0277H), Rohgah (H7303) and Jehubbah (H3160)
§ Aram or Arameans = "exalted"
n pr m
1) Aram or Syriathe nation
2) the Syrian or Aramean people

n m

4) a grandson of Nahor
5) a descendant of Asher
